DOC.brief_title: Long Duration Stimulant Treatment Study Preschoolers With ADHD-Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: This single site , open-label , four-week feasibility study long-duration bead methylphenidate ( B-MPH ) , also know Ritalin LA™ . B-MPH FDA-approved medication child 6 year old attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) , study use preschooler . This study evaluate safety effectiveness B-MPH ADHD treatment 4-to-5-year old child . Total study duration approximately 5 week . It include screen evaluation 4 week B-MPH treatment dose range 10 30 mg ( base individual tolerability efficacy ) . The study doctor conduct parent-training session treatment visit .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Parent/legal guardian provide informed consent ; child provide verbal assent 2 . Parent child must Englishspeaking 3 . Child must good physical health 4 . Child must stimulantnaïve , OR ADHD medication , OR take ADHD medication find helpful 5 . Child must IQ least 70 6 . Child must educational setting ( e.g. , preschool , kindergarten , elementary school program ) least two half day weekly 1 . Child adjustment disorder , autism , psychosis , bipolar disorder , significant suicidality , psychiatric disorder 2 . Child current history physical , sexual , emotional abuse 3 . Child history intolerance stimulant medication 4 . Child respond adequate stimulant medication trial 5 . Child take medication exclude study 6 . Child parent refuse comply study procedure
